STEP_1.TITLE: Welcome!
STEP_1.BODY: This is a short tour through Simple App!

STEP_2.TITLE: Help
STEP_2.BODY: You can start this tour at any time!

STEP_4.TITLE: Navigation
STEP_4.BODY: By clicking on this items, you can navigate through application.

STEP_5.TITLE: List actions
STEP_5.BODY: You can change sort, order, filter items by user or simply search posts on this list.

STEP_6.TITLE: Post creator
STEP_6.BODY: If you click on this, it will show you more detailed information about the user.

STEP_7.TITLE: Like toggle
STEP_7.BODY: You can add or remove post from your favourites.

STEP_8.TITLE: Language changer
STEP_8.BODY: You can change your preferred language here.
